info.description: This REST-based API aims to leverage the tools of the OSHDB through allowing to access some of its functionalities via HTTP requests. The official documentation can be found here.
info.title: ohsome API

tags.name: Area
tags.description: Compute the area of polygonal OSM elements

tags.name: Count
tags.description: Compute the count of point/linear/polygonal OSM elements

tags.name: Length
tags.description: Compute the length of linear OSM elements

tags.name: Perimeter
tags.description: Compute the perimeter of polygonal OSM elements

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Compute data aggregation functions on users

get.summary: Area of OSM elements

parameters.name: bboxes
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format geojson (for /groupBy/boundary resources only), csv, or json; default: json

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO-8601 conform timestring(s); default: latest timestamp within dataset

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format geojson (for /groupBy/boundary resources only), csv, or json; default: json

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO-8601 conform timestring(s); default: latest timestamp within dataset

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format geojson (for /groupBy/boundary resources only), csv, or json; default: json

parameters.name: groupByKey
parameters.description: OSM key e.g.: 'highway', 'building'; no default value (one groupByKey parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: groupByValues
parameters.description: OSM value(s) e.g.: 'primary', 'residential'; default: no value

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO-8601 conform timestring(s); default: latest timestamp within dataset

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format geojson (for /groupBy/boundary resources only), csv, or json; default: json

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: showMetadata
parameters.description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO-8601 conform timestring(s); default: latest timestamp within dataset

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: This parameter has been deprecated since v1.0. We encourage you to use the new parameter 'filter' instead.

parameters.name: bboxes
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bcircles
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: bpolys
parameters.description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format geojson (for /groupBy/boundary resources only), csv, or json; default: json
